mapper.select: SELECT m.m_no, m.m_name, m.m_gender, CASE WHEN f.m_no IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isFollowing, CASE WHEN b.m_no IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isBlocked FROM member AS m LEFT JOIN follow AS f ON m.m_no = f.m_target_no AND f.m_no = #{currentUserNo} LEFT JOIN block AS b ON m.m_no = b.m_target_no AND b.m_no = #{currentUserNo} WHERE m.m_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT m.m_no, m.m_name, m.m_gender, CASE WHEN f.m_no IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isFollowing, CASE WHEN b.m_no IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isBlocked FROM member AS m LEFT JOIN follow AS f ON m.m_no = f.m_target_no AND f.m_no = #{currentUserNo} LEFT JOIN block AS b ON m.m_no = b.m_target_no AND b.m_no = #{currentUserNo} WHERE m.m_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%') LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM block WHERE m_target_no = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE m_target_no = #{memberNo}
